## computeArrayStats() function

Only exported for testing 

Compute the \[\[ArrayStats\]\] for the passed in array of numbers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function computeArrayStats(samples: number[]): Stats | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  samples | number\[\] | Array containing sampled values. Will be modified (!) by sorting the entries. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Stats](./harp-mapview.stats.md) \| undefined
